Title: Luck Be a Lady
Plot: The girls attend a movie premiere sponsored by Shane's underwear campaign. Papi teaches Helena and Alice how to play poker for a high-stakes private game hosted by a high-profile female gambler. Bette disagrees with Tina about Angelica's education, and goes on a date with Jodi. Meanwhile, Phyllis is having trouble letting go of Alice.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Contains drug use, sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Daniel Bacon,  Andre Fex,  Grace Sherman,  Alyssa Pridham,  Vanessa Tomasino,  David Lewis,  Bruce Dawson,  G. Patrick Currie,  Marc Dion,  Enid-Raye Adams,  Guy Fauchon,  Carrie Anne Fleming,  Caroline Cave,  He
